column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " In my head , I saw that playing out very differently . "
#Text=Asami says : " Maybe we should have stayed and tried harder to convince him to join us . "
#Text=Bolin says : " Or we could have thrown him in a potato sack and forced him into the ship . "
#Text=Bumi says : " That 's how they got me to join the United Forces . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " No , we ca n't coerce people , or throw them in potato sacks .
#Text=There 's nothing more nutritious than our vegetarian diet .
#Text=I can tell that you 're going to love wearing our ancient airbender robes .
#Text=They 're very breathable .
#Text=You 'll never have to worry about your worldly possessions again , because you wo n't have any .
#Text=You 'll get to shave your head .
#Text=Your best friend will be a giant bison !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Ugh , I really thought I had that last guy .
#Text=Who does n't want a bison as their best friend ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " It 's okay Tenzin , I still want to be an airbender .
#Text=" Korra says : " Okay , we 've tried it your way , and people just do n't seem to be responding .
#Text=It 's time for a little tough love .
#Text="
